choose.when: where (title like '%' || #{search} || '%' or content like '%' || #{search} || '%' or writer like '%' || #{search} || '%')

mapper.insert: insert into qna( qnano, title, content, qnadate, writer, originno, groupord, grouplayer ) values( qna_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{writer}, qna_seq.nextval, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: update qna set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, qnadate=sysdate where qnano = #{qnano}
